Package chess.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
chess.board.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class handles the pieces on the board as well as manage valid moves including identification of check and checkmate.
Author:
Apurva Narde, Max Geiger

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Default constructor creates a new board using 2D Piece array of size 8x8 and then calls reset() with sets the board to the inital state.
    Board(Board board)
    Copy Constructor

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Default constructor creates a new board using 2D Piece array of size 8x8 and then calls reset() with sets the board to the inital state.

    • Board

      public Board(Board board)
      Copy Constructor
      Parameters:
      board - the specific board object to be copied thoroughly including the state of each piece whether it has moved or not

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      resets the board to the inital state by placing the pieces in their respective starting positions as required by the rules of chess.

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(int x, int y)
      Returns the Piece at the specified location on the board.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate on the board
      y - y-coordinate on the board
      Returns:
      the specific piece at the location or null if the board coordinates are out of bound.

    • promote

      public void promote(int x, int y, boolean white, char type)
      Promotes the pawn to the desired piece.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate on the board
      y - y-coordinate on the board
      white - (true) white, (false) black
      type - type of piece to promote to. Possible options are 'N', 'R', 'B'. Default queen is implied.

    • movePiece

      public boolean movePiece(int x0, int y0, int x, int y)
      Move piece from initial cooridate to final coordiante if the move is legal.
      Parameters:
      x0 - x-coordinate of the location to move from on the board
      y0 - y-coordinate of the location to move from on the board
      x - x-coordinate of the location to move to on the board
      y - y-coordinate of the location to move to on the board
      Returns:
      true if the move is legal and false if the move is illegal

    • isCheck

      public boolean isCheck(boolean white)
      To check whether the king of a player is in check.
      Parameters:
      white - (true) check if white's king is in check, (false) check if black's king is in check.
      Returns:
      true if the king is in check or false if the king is not in check.

    • isCheckMate

      public boolean isCheckMate(boolean white)
      To check whether the king of a player checkmated.
      Parameters:
      white - (true) check if white cannot stop check, (false) check if black cannot stop check.
      Returns:
      true if the player cannot block check or false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      print the board with all of it's pieces on the terminal.
